gh.asteroids1

Class Asteroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • gh.asteroids1.BaseVectorShape
      • gh.asteroids1.Asteroid

  • public class Asteroid
extends BaseVectorShape
    Models the asteroid shape used in the Asteroids Applet game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double rVelocity 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Asteroid()
      Constructs an Asteroid with no rotational velocity, and isAlive by default (see superclass).
